code: import{BadgeCheckIcon,ChipIcon}from"@heroicons/react/solid";import React from"react";import Slider from"react-slick";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick.css";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css";import{programming,softwares,languages}from"../data";import'../styles/fonts.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Skills(){const slides=[{title:"Programming Languages",items:programming},{title:"Software Tools",items:softwares},{title:"Languages",items:languages}];const settings={dots:true,infinite:true,speed:500,slidesToShow:1,slidesToScroll:1};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"skills-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container px-5 py-10 mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center mb-20",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"sm:text-4xl text-3xl font-medium title-font text-white mb-4",style:{fontFamily:'customFont',fontSize:'50px'},children:"Skills & Technologies"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{...settings,children:slides.map((slide,slideIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold text-white mb-4 text-center",style:{fontFamily:'CustomFontLight',fontSize:'30px'},children:slide.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap lg:w-4/5 sm:mx-auto sm:mb-2 -mx-2",children:slide.items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-2 sm:w-1/2 w-full",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-800 rounded flex p-4 h-full items-center item-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BadgeCheckIcon,{className:"text-green-400 w-6 h-6 flex-shrink-0 mr-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"title-font font-medium text-white",style:{fontFamily:'Roboto Mono'},children:item})]})},index))})]},slideIndex))})]})});}
